name: A11C - Anarchy
description:
Developed 100% on Phaser 3 for Gamedev.js gamejam!

Controls:

  • Click on your units to select. They will auto fire, but you need to move them in place.
  • Use the move wheel to zoom in/out.
  • On the game screen, use the M key to turn off the music if you want to ... but it is awesome.
  • On the "Foresight" screen you can use the ESC key to skip.

Browser note: Use Chrome ... don't be one of those guys ... other browsers may have issues not accounted for.

TODO:

  • Procedurally generated maps.
  • More enemy units.
  • Make enemy units fight back.
  • Setup different goals. Protect buildings, protect people, assassinate, hold position.
  • Faster action modes.
  • Time shifting mechanics.

KNOWN BUGS:

There is a bug where some of the characters get stuck while moving, try to zoom in and out to help their lazy selves move. It is so annoying!
